snippet: Tonalist won the 146th running of the Belmont Stakes on Saturday, denying California Chrome his shot at becoming the first Triple Crown winner since Affirmed in 1978.
abstract: Tonalist wins 146th running of the Belmont Stakes, denying California Chrome his shot at becoming the first Triple Crown winner since Affirmed in 1978; edges Commissioner at the wire for the victory and California Chrome is in dead heat for fourth with Wicked Strong.
lead_paragraph: Tonalist won the 146th running of the Belmont Stakes on Saturday, denying California Chrome his shot at becoming the first Triple Crown winner since Affirmed in 1978.

headline.seo: Belmont Stakes 2014: Tonalist Wins, Denying California Chrome the Triple Crown
headline.main: Fresh Legs Stamp Out a Coronation
headline.print_headline: Fresh Legs Stamp Out a Coronation
